parts.text:
```json
{
  "application": "stemdl",
  "details": {
    "framework": "TensorFlow",
    "distributed training": "Horovod",
    "communication": "MPI",
    "libraries": [
      "CUDA",
      "NCCL",
      "Spectrum MPI",
      "PAMI",
      "nvme",
      "jsrun"
    ],
    "resource requirements": {
      "nodes": 256,
      "cores per node": 42,
      "GPUs per node": 6,
      "memory": "maximizegpfs",
      "queue": "batch"
    },
    "environment variables": [
      "TF_CPP_MIN_LOG_LEVEL",
      "TF_CUDNN_USE_AUTOTUNE",
      "TF_AUTOTUNE_THRESHOLD",
      "TF_ENABLE_WINOGRAD_NONFUSED",
      "TF_ENABLE_XLA",
      "TF_GPU_THREAD_COUNT",
      "TF_USE_CUDNN_BATCHNORM_SPATIAL_PERSISTENT",
      "TF_GPU_THREAD_MODE",
      "LD_LIBRARY_PATH",
      "PATH",
      "PYTHONIOENCODING",
      "HOROVOD_HIERARCHICAL_ALLREDUCE",
      "HOROVOD_GPU_ALLGATHER",
      "HOROVOD_MPI_THREADS_DISABLE",
      "HOROVOD_HIERARCHICAL_ALLGATHER",
      "HOROVOD_TIMELINE",
      "HOROVOD_GROUPED_ALLREDUCES",
      "HOROVOD_CYCLE_TIME",
      "HOROVOD_FUSION_THRESHOLD",
      "OMPI_LD_PRELOAD_POSTPEND",
      "MPI_ASC_OUTPUT",
      "CUDNN_LOGINFO_DBG",
      "CUDNN_LOGDEST_DBG",
      "PAMI_IBV_ENABLE_DCT",
      "PAMI_ENABLE_STRIPING",
      "PAMI_IBV_ADAPTER_AFFINITY",
      "PAMI_IBV_QP_SERVICE_LEVEL",
      "PAMI_IBV_ENABLE_OOO_AR",
      "PAMI_IBV_DEVICE_NAME",
      "PAMI_IBV_DEVICE_NAME_1",
      "NCCL_MIN_NRINGS",
      "NCCL_IB_CUDA_SUPPORT",
      "NCCL_MAX_NRINGS",
      "NCCL_IB_HCA",
      "NCCL_BUFFSIZE",
      "NCCL_LL_THRESHOLD",
      "NCCL_DEBUG",
      "NCCL_DEBUG_FILE"
    ]
  }
}
```
